sense.def:
A quantity of something
je količina snovi ali stvari, ki jo lahko izmerimo ali preštejemo.

seg.quote: You only need a very small quantity.
Natural gas was discovered in large quantities beneath the North Sea.

sense.def:
Quantity
je količina nečesa; pogosto se uporablja kot nasprotje kakovosti iste stvari.

seg.quote: The food supply has grown less, in quantity and quality.

sense.def:
Kar izdelujemo
in quantity
, izdelujemo v velikih količinah.

Kadar rečemo, da je oseba ali stvar
an unknown quantity
, hočemo reči, da o njej ne vemo ničesar.

seg.quote: To Shanti the outside world was a totally unknown quantity.
